articles.title: Dubai bans privacy tokens, tightens stablecoin rules in crypto reset
articles.description: Dubai's financial regulator said privacy-focused assets are incompatible with global compliance norms as it moves to a firm-led token suitability model and sharper stablecoin classifications.

articles.title: Coinbase pushes back against banks to keep rewarding users for holding stablecoins
articles.description: Disagreements over stablecoin rewards have frayed bipartisan support for the bill, with traders estimating a 68-70% chance of passage this year.

articles.title: Adam Back-backed Bitcoin treasury Future Holdings set for takeover by H100
articles.description: Adam Back-backed Bitcoin treasury Future Holdings has agreed to a takeover proposal from Sweden-listed H100 Group as it eyes expansion into Switzerland.

articles.title: Bitcoin treasury firms linked to Adam Back sign preliminary agreement to combine
articles.description: The proposed deal would take Sweden-based H100 into Switzerland and deepen its institutional bitcoin treasury strategy.

articles.title: Bitcoin's early gains fade fast as prices fall back below $91,000
articles.description: Risk sentiment deteriorates as safe havens outperform and equities weaken.

articles.title: Stablecoins, sanctions and surveillance: Why 2025 reshaped cryptoâ€™s regulatory reality
articles.description: From record onchain volumes to geopolitics-driven crypto crime, 2025 structurally shifted how regulators and institutions engaged with digital assets, with stablecoins at the center.

articles.title: Fed rate cuts under fire: 5 things to know in Bitcoin this week
articles.description: Bitcoin injected volatility as legal action against the Federal Reserve combined with market nerves over geopolitics at the start of a key week for inflation data.

articles.title: SEC delays PENGU and T. Rowe crypto ETFs as Grayscale seeks options green light
articles.description: The SEC delayed decisions on two crypto ETFs and opened public comments on options tied to a Grayscale multi-asset crypto fund.
